Text:
4 films seeded in less than a week and every one of them has a multitude of people stuck at less than 100%  all with the same amount of completion.

Tangemassa, dude, seed to completion, thanks for posting but either complete one torrent upload and move on, or just move on.
is this with original English sound or dubed Spanish?
I'm stuck at 81.9% after 12 hours of keeping my window open. :(  Can anyone reseed this so I can complete the download and watch this? I haven't seen this since I was 12!  Thanks so much!
Stuck now at 83.6%. I would really appreciate it if someone could FINISH the seed instead of just opening it for a bit and closing it. Thanks!
Just a note - this version has subtitles on it.
Thisw version has Norwegian subs hard encoded.

Sound quality is sorta shitty and visuals aren't amazing but are fine.

Probably the best version on TPB though.
